name: Tumble
author: Scott Taylor

sections.description:
Your Media Library and Post History are a wealth of information and assets. Tumble allows you to pick items to share on Tumblr with just one click. The plugin is smart enough to know what kind of content you are sending and will make the proper API call to Tumblr. Super easy!

Read more: http://scottctaylor.wordpress.com/2010/11/18/new-plugin-tumble/
sections.installation: Go to plugins/tumble/tumble.php and enter your Tumblr Username/Password. This is much less expensive than going to the database every time for these values.

short_description: Tumble is simple-to-use and allows you to manually send Posts, Images, Audio, and Video to Tumblr from within your Dashboard/Media Library
